item.title: Spalding NBA Marble
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Spalding NBA Marble stands out with the nice color pattern. Each Spalding NBA Marble basketball has its own unique color pattern. The Spalding basketballs from the Marble collection are suited for outdoor and have the official NBA-size and weight. The Spalding NBA Marble basketball is delivered empty and thus has to be pumped. This […]
item.content:encoded:
The Spalding NBA Marble stands out with the nice color pattern. Each Spalding NBA Marble basketball has its own unique color pattern. The Spalding basketballs from the Marble collection are suited for outdoor and have the official NBA-size and weight. The Spalding NBA Marble basketball is delivered empty and thus has to be pumped. This requires a pump with needle valve!

Features and benefits
– Use: Outdoor
– Exclusive color technology
– Unique color max for each ball
– Material: rubber
– Official NBA size and weight
– Size 7

Color: White / Blue
SKU: 83636

item.title: Nike Dri-Fit Head Tie 3.0
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: he Nike Dri-Fit Head Tie 3.0 keeps you cool and dry during your workout thanks to the Dri-Fit material. The head band is adjustable an has a length of 99 cm. With a width of 6,5 cm, the hairs will stay out of your face. Features and benefits – Dri-Fit material – Adjustable – Length: […]
item.content:encoded:
he Nike Dri-Fit Head Tie 3.0 keeps you cool and dry during your workout thanks to the Dri-Fit material. The head band is adjustable an has a length of 99 cm. With a width of 6,5 cm, the hairs will stay out of your face.

Features and benefits
– Dri-Fit material
– Adjustable
– Length: 99 cm
– Width: 6.5 cm
– Material: 88 % polyester, 12% spandex

Color: Black
SKU: N0003706010OS

item.title: Spalding TF151
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Spalding TF-151 is our basic rubber basketball. Use the ball on any surface, both in and outdoor.
item.content:encoded:
Spalding TF151

The Spalding TF-151 is our basic rubber basketball. Use the ball on any surface, both in and outdoor.

Features and benefits

– Rubber surface
– Polyester windings
– Indoor and outdoor

Color: Orange
SKU: 73953

item.title: Erima Hurdles 1212
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Erima Hurdles Many different possibilities for training jump power, dribbling and mobility. For more stability, the standards can be filled with sand Consisting of 2 hurdles 6 rods (Ø 2.5 cm, height 160 cm) 4 standards (Ø 20 cm) 4 connection clips
item.content:encoded:
Erima Hurdles

Many different possibilities for training jump power, dribbling and mobility.
For more stability, the standards can be filled with sand
Consisting of 2 hurdles
6 rods (Ø 2.5 cm, height 160 cm)
4 standards (Ø 20 cm)
4 connection clips

item.title: Coordination Ladder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Coordination Ladder Coordination Ladder Ideal for running, sprinting and coordination training for improved work of the legs 12 non-breakable plastic rungs, connected to hard-wearing straps Variable distance between the rungs incl. transport bag Length approx. 6 m, width 0.5 m Color: SKU: 724105
item.content:encoded:
Coordination Ladder

Coordination Ladder

Ideal for running, sprinting and coordination training for improved work of the legs
12 non-breakable plastic rungs, connected to hard-wearing straps
Variable distance between the rungs
incl. transport bag
Length approx. 6 m, width 0.5 m

Color:
SKU: 724105

item.content:encoded:
he Nike Dri-Fit Head Tie 3.0 keeps you cool and dry during your workout thanks to the Dri-Fit material. The head band is adjustable an has a length of 99 cm. With a width of 6,5 cm, the hairs will stay out of your face.

Features and benefits

basketball
– Dri-Fit material
– Adjustable
– Length: 99 cm
– Width: 6.5 cm
– Material: 88 % polyester, 12% spandex

Color: Black
SKU: N0003706010OS

item.content:encoded:
The Spalding NBA Marble stands out with the nice color pattern. Each Spalding NBA Marble basketball has its own unique color pattern. The Spalding basketballs from the Marble collection are suited for outdoor and have the official NBA-size and weight. The Spalding NBA Marble basketball is delivered empty and thus has to be pumped. This requires a pump with needle valve!

Features and benefits
– Use: Outdoor
– Exclusive color technology
– Unique color max for each ball
– Material: rubber
– Official NBA size and weight
– Size 7

Color: White / Blue
SKU: 83636
